Lumici | http://www.lumici.co.uk/ | Various onsite/remote roles

Hey what’s up? I am Connor and I am the Web Applications Developer at Lumici.

We are an Educational Technologies start-up company based in Derby, UK. Our aim is simple, “to harness the power of technology to improve learning” and that’s what we do! We are soon to be releasing our first beta for the lesson planner, which we are really excited about.

If you would like to join our venture, we are looking for the following roles;

Software Engineer User Experience Designer UX UI Front End Developer

If you would like more information about the roles, or the product please contact us on info@lumici.co.uk
